content: super-fast scarf by wendy c brown materials 4oz worsted weight yarn color a 4oz worsted weight yarn color b q hook yarn needle notes entire scarf is worked with 2 strands held together gauge is not important for this project chain 11 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain to end row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet to end row 3-100 repeat row 2 until 100 row or desired length tie off and weave in ends copyright 2008 wendy c brown all rights reserved reproducing or transmitting this pattern by any means for any purpose other than personal use constitutes a violation of copyright law finished product not to be used for resale or profit personal or charitable use only
